title: Tech & Mgt Cap Proj
description: Project-based course where students in the Technology and Management Program will work in inter-disciplinary teams on projects provided by corporate affiliates.  Credit not allowed for both ME 4742 and CS 4742 or MGT 4742.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ME 4741 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
